root: ^I hope you had as much fun as I did.
^But... Before I leave there is something I want to tell you.
^Sometimes, everybody has a moment in life when everything is awful and nothing is can throw our bad thoughts out of our heads.
^After the heaviest rain, always comes the brightest rainbow.
^There always has to be someone who can see your pain
^And make it much less painful for you... Even if it means just listening to you, or playing childish games... It doesn't matter...
^I am going for now, but you know what comes next
^I will return tomorrow, and bring something new to make your time here less boring!
